summary: Set in a pre-colonial African past, Tilai is about an illicit love affair and its consequences. Saga returns to his village after an extended absence to discover that his father has taken ... See full summary »
cast: Rasmané Ouédraogo|Ina Cissé|Roukietou Barry|Assane Ouedraogo|Sibidou Sidibe|Moumouni Ouedraogo|Mariam Barry|Seydou Ouédraogo|Mariam Ouedraogo|Daouda Porgo|Kogre Warma|Mamadou Ganame|Noufou Ouédraogo|Amade Ganame|Issaka Porgo|Moumouni Selinga|Adame Sidibe|Boureima Warma|Fati Ouedraogo|Salif Ouedraogo|Azeta Porgo|Madi Derme|Amidou Ouédraogo|Assita Ouedraogo
title: Tilaï
